https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4hYsZXXtITVkeQBZeZ7enotcbXM.jpg Padmanabhan has earned the nickname Budget as he is a miser. However, he struggles to save his father's house from money lenders as his wife is a spendthrift and never lets him save enough. Budget Padmanabhan
